name: Rift Walker
description:
Play as Zeke, the Rift Walker as you explore the realm of Riftania and recruit multiple party members with different classes, as you progress onward traveling through different rifts that traverse different realms and timelines in order to defeat the 3 Demon Generals and the Dark Lord, saving the Realms from the imminent demonic threat!

- Grow herbs using the Farming skill and use them to make tons of potions!

- Mine ores using the Mining skill, smelt them into bars and craft them into useful weapons and armor!

- Delve into multiple optional dungeons for better spells, skills, unique elemental weapons and armors!

- Complete Main and Side quests in order to fully explore every nook and cranny of the realms!

- Use fires around the world to cook basic foods into yummy stat boosting pies and health restoring rations!

- Unlock extra content after the main story is completed!



Explore the 4 Continents of Riftania and encounter the 6 basic elements and weapons, armor and skills corresponding to them!
